channel.title: how to quickly get tasty burgers?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "how to quickly get tasty burgers?"

item.title: Re: how to quickly get tasty burgers?
item.content:encoded: I was thinking there was a Reaper ally that helped out but it is for finding allies on missions and not getting team ally drops. So Lil Bo, Olmek and HoClaus.

item.title: Re: how to quickly get tasty burgers?
item.content:encoded: still better to use lil bo, ho clause, and olmek, with i need this jutsu, and stand by ninja theme. also chaser juice is good too as Buretsu posted earlier

item.title: Re: how to quickly get tasty burgers?
item.content:encoded: an addition to my post above, I have done another missions, and I have gotten another 2 tasty burgers, so try it out (on the 3 missions i didnt get burgers I got a hot pic of terri, food pills, and a bag of chips, so either way it was win win).

item.title: Re: how to quickly get tasty burgers?
item.content:encoded:
ok I dunno if this is a coincidence, I set up a team, Terri, lil'bo, and spot, so i could get items/allies aswell as the quest drops, and I was actually after the hot pics and bag of chips.

anyway out of the past 5 missions, 3 of them have dropped tasty burgers

as I said i dunno if it coincidence, but could be a way to help you guys.

item.title: Re: how to quickly get tasty burgers?
item.content:encoded:
Okay, people seriously need to get it through their skulls that things like Spot and Urination and Diagnosis and Ichi Ramen do NOT WORK WITH ALLY DROPS. THEY ONLY AFFECT ITEMS THAT DROP AS REWARDS FOR COMPLETING A MISSION.

If you want to increase Ally Drop rate, learn Goodboy's I Need This Jutsu, set Stand By Your Ninja as your Battle Theme and, if you're really desperate, drink a bunch of Chasers from the Juice Bar.

item.title: Re: how to quickly get tasty burgers?
item.content:encoded: The fastest way to get tasty burgers in Season 1 that I've found is to use the team Big Bo, Lil' Bo, and Spot. If your village has the ramen shop upgrade, then you can purchanse the Ichi Special. Also, if you have Spot's Epic Urination Jutsu, you can use that on lower level missions to almost guarantee the drop of two tasty burgers a mission.

item.title: Re: how to quickly get tasty burgers?
item.content:encoded:
I am fairly certain that McMaster's has mentioned that Ally drops are affected by who else is in the team. It has not been stated how they are affected… as in, it could be better or worse.

My personal theory is that Olmek lowers your chance of a drop slightly (around 5-10%… I consistently get fewer drops with Olmek), but doubles the drops (overall, I get more drops, so it is still a bonus). Thus, pairing him with HoClaus is essential.

I suspect that teams do boost the drop rate, but I'm running numbers on so many things right now I'm not adding another to my list.

item.title: Re: how to quickly get tasty burgers?
Re: how to quickly get tasty burgers?
item.content:encoded:
Statistically, the best/fastest way as season 2+:
Lil' Bo lvl 2 + HoClaus + Olmek with Stand By Your Ninja as the theme.
This group probably gets you 50 burgers easily in a day.

If you are a season 1 or don't have HoClaus/Olmek/etc, *shrugs*.
Pinky lvl 2 + Stalkergirl lvl 2 + Lil' Bo lvl 2 and straight TAI for stamina and strength efficiencies?

item.title: Re: how to quickly get tasty burgers?
item.content:encoded:
thanks men i try it and after make the team the first mission i get one tasty

i will try it tomorrow with the next stamina alotment

thanks

item.title: Re: how to quickly get tasty burgers?
item.content:encoded: But it all could be statistical anomaly. :P
